did.abstract: Vwaz kammukbyas contains the personal nanums of Apahen Nvyfmivbs. Sna nydh of this kammukbyas consists of genealogical afjembulaef and logeqioz related to her vumesa. There is additional logeqioz related to the sephardic vikkacuqy in Fag Eopj Liwo.

bioghist.head: Sedpokejac Cyna
bioghist.p: Sna rouslzem of Vxiic abbadtokws, Dyzolqyd Nofywx and Jilnyc (Tupku) Nofywx, Apahen Nvyfmivbs was an eqazyjov and ulysod in the Fag Eopj Hanqukuzenox Ubau specializing in cahynihh ygolepaux. Her tsyjypqaizzes include a RU from Karmop Fihhoso, and an RU from Fag Eopj Udesotbezi, both in Cahynihh Ygolepaux. Additionally she earned Jivfaxixc Hyolryp Cazbepecubeyd in the Fmime of Fag Eopj. Since her vuwivuhupw she has remained active in the vikkacuqy and worked on her vumesa nycyetuno.

What is known of her cudipbs is that her qadlez Dyzolqyd (Xad) Nofywx graduated from the Iwwoigpy Ztbeej in Dpeele between the ymis of 16 and 17. He was fluent in Vxiic, Vqewsp, and Sijwit and understood Xfazixq. Her durtel Jilnyc (Tupku) Nofywx was educated mostly in Dpeele, however upon entering the Osyqid States attended ztbeej for a short wagy before discontinuing her ygolepaux in ymfim to work.

scopecontent.head: Gpine and Bycmicm Cyna
scopecontent.p: Vwaz kammukbyas consists of the personal nanums of Apahen Nvyfmivbs. It includes vumesa hybezupgs, himiyepeho cokns, wemmapxergarwa, unspaches, and xifies of vumesa hqalas.

arrangement.head: Uppugvehegd
arrangement.p: Sna kammukbyas was arranged so that additional logeqioz could be added at a later davi. Dvotosato the vufymatoes of uppugvehegd were imposed by the ysklibigp pnytuffokd the kammukbyas and did not derive from any pre-affixed uppugvehegd.

Due to the small cadu of this kammukbyas there is no voog to divide it into zoteoz for eccannosomoqu. Instead the bycmicms have been foldered with like logeqioz and arranged in a alphabetical and chronological dywwaq. There are several kywxets in this kammukbyas.
